      • shutdownExecutorService

        public static void shutdownExecutorService(Class clazz,
                                           ExecutorService executorService,
                                           org.slf4j.Logger logger)
                                    throws InterruptedException
        Initiates an orderly shutdown in which previously submitted tasks are executed, but no new tasks are accepted. Invocation has no additional effect if already shut down. This also blocks until all tasks have completed execution request, or the timeout occurs, or the current thread is interrupted, whichever happens first.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class that invokes shutdown on the ExecutorService.
        executorService - ExecutorService to shutdown.
        logger - Logger to log shutdown for invoking class.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if shutdown is interrupted.
